amendment.description: An amendment numbered 68 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to allow FAA approved high-octane unleaded aviation gasoline to be sold at airports in lieu of 100 octane low-lead aviation gasoline.
amendment.purpose: Amendment allows the Federal Aviation Administration approved high-octane unleaded aviation gasoline to be sold at airports in lieu of 100 octane low-lead aviation gasoline.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obernolte amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 205 (Roll no. 354).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Obernolte.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Obernolte amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 205 (Roll no. 354).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
